name: Desperados 2: Cooper's Revenge
description: Desperados 2 is the sequel to the successful wild west title Desperados - Wanted Dead or Alive. The gameplay is based on its predecessor but with brand new tactical possibilities in a beautiful 3D environment. Switch from an isometric view to a third person view whenever you want; for example, for duels, brawls and shoot-outs.
minimum_requirements: Supported OS: Windows®, 2000/XP Processor: Pentium® 4 1.9 GHz or AMD Athlon™ XP 1900 or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Hardware T&L-compatible video card* DirectX Version: version 9.0c (included) or higher Sound: DirectX® version 9.0c-compatible sound card Hard Drive: 4 GB free*Video cards that do not have hardware shader support, such as the GeForce 4 MX or any Intel Integrated graphics, are not supported.

reviews.review_text: This game has some bugs, it's rubbish :( I prefer the original Desperados: Wanted Dead or Alive. I won't recommend it.
